## Document.subscribe() method

`subscribe` registers a callback to subscribe to events on the document. The callback will be called when the targetPath or any of its nested values change.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
subscribe(targetPath: string, next: NextFn<DocEvent>, error?: ErrorFn, complete?: CompleteFn): Unsubscribe;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  targetPath | string |  |
|  next | NextFn&lt;[DocEvent](./yorkie-js-sdk.docevent.md)<!-- -->&gt; |  |
|  error | ErrorFn |  |
|  complete | CompleteFn |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Unsubscribe
